## Instructions

To explore the taxonomy:

1. Select a scale domain.

2. Select a scale level

3. Select a scale construct.

4. Select a scale category.

5. Select a scale aspect.


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(collapsibleTree)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
Domains <- read_excel("data/Measurement and Conceptual Taxonomy Table.xlsx")
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
collapsibleTree(
  Domains,
  hierarchy = c("Scale Domain", 
                "Scale Level", 
                "Scale Construct",
                "Scale Category",
                "Scale Aspect",
                "Scale Title and Citation"
                ),
  width = 1200,
  zoomable = TRUE,
  tooltip = FALSE,
  collapsed = TRUE
)
```
